item1.title: What doesn't change in the AI era is you.
item1.content: More powerful AI, tools, and agents are pouring out every day. How are you changing every day?

item2.title: AI alone cannot do anything.
item2.content: Creating practical web/apps requires a lot of human intervention. AI ultimately just produces output when given input without thinking.
item2.hint: AI is just a tool, you must provide direction and control to create the desired result.

item3.title: Web/apps created with AI have no copyright.
item3.content: Copyright restrictions are much greater than creating music with AI. Hundreds/thousands of open-source library modules are used to develop simple software.
item3.gpl: All software using GPL license must be released as open source.
item3.hint: Have you checked the copyright of all libraries used by the software you create? Otherwise, you may be violating copyright without knowing it.
